name: Space TV
description:
you play as a TV and you need to catch special waves to get a bigger signal. You can catch blue waves and red waves, but you can't catch them at the same time, for this you need to take a special piece to change this fishing. All this is possible only in space mines. 

Controls - A,D or left arrow, right arrow for movement. "Gravity" button for changing gravity

For Bit-Byte Jam №1

(Sorry for bugs with sound and button)
